notes.text: The MultiValueField binding to a JSON model is now publicly available
We’ve reduced the number of API calls to improve the performance when loading a quick view
You can now clear the field values of non-string fields using the mass edit dialog
We now ensure that the ValueListParameterOut annotation works correctly also when it is used as the description of the value help’s field
We’ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
We now ensure that the value help of MultiValue fields in action parameter dialogs works correctly
The MessageButton now only displays validation errors for controls with validation errors and back-end errors
SideEffects network requests applied on structural changes like create and delete, that rely on the MuliValueField, are now performed in the correct sequence
We've resolved an issue with the DateTime format for default values when merging it with the startup parameter
We now ensure that a value help with a typeahead opens without errors.
We now ensure that the width of the typeahead table is changed when window is resized
We now ensure that reading from undefined conditions is avoided in the type-ahead functionality of the value help
We now ensure that BindindInfo filters are properly set
We've now fixed an issue that occurred while navigating from a quick view to another app, where the semantic object mappings are not applied
We now ensure that the TimePicker is shown for FilterFields of type Edm.TimeOfDay
We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
